attributes.action: LEGISLATE TO STOP UNSOLITED PREMIUM RATE PHONE CALLS AND TEXT MESSAGES
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Internet is laden with complaints about unsolicited premium rate phone calls and received text messages. It is about time the Government put an end to this criminal behaviour by stopping the phone companies acting as collecting agents for these unscrupolous businesses

rejection.details: Capital letters make your petition very hard to read
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
